articles.title: DEAL OF THE DAY: British Airways launch biggest January 2022 sale - holidays from £119 up - Express
articles.description: BRITISH AIRWAYS has just launched its biggest ever January 2022 sale with flights to more than 100 destinations. Perfect for planning a holiday later in the new year, book now to get a bargain on your dream holiday.
